overview: A man, John Calavanico, crosses the precipice from sanity to insanity killing his roommate, then the roommateâ€™s long lost daughter and mother and another man. A detective, Nicholas M. Garofolo, is saved by the zombie bodies. With Allegra Ashton, Jolie Curran and Ashish Patel. Director and Writer Dave Sweeney. Cinematography by Marc Fratto
tagline: A man crosses the precipice from sanity to insanity killing his roommate, then the roommate's long lost daughter and mother and another man.
title: Deranged Foxhole Deduction
